head.title: In Lawn Mower Races, the Loser Is Earth

hedline.hl1: In Lawn Mower Races, the Loser Is Earth

abstract.p: Matthew G Mitro letter on June 12 front page article on growing infatuation of American men with lawn mower races; says races will allow quiet time at home in backyard during summer when men take their lawn mowers out of neighborhood for races; drawing

block.p: Re ''Gentlemen, Start Your Lawn Mower Engines'' (front page, June 12): If lawn mower racing events are successful at drawing these machines and those who like to listen to them out of our neighborhoods for a Saturday morning, the implications will be staggering: quiet time at home in the backyard during the summer!
MATTHEW G. MITRO Narragansett, R.I., June 12, 2000
